summary: This mod adds a sheogorath follower to the game Click for more info
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a sheogorath follower to the game skyrim he will follow you and he sounds allot like he was meant to be a follower.

This mod is deferentially not lore friendly but is super fun to have him following you. O ye he is not over powered and he will grow with you.
Watch video for info.  You can find him in after you complete the wabbajack mission, [b]go to the bottom floor of the [/b][b]pelagius wing and there should be a door you can enter back to the mind of [/b][b]pelagius and then you can talk to Sheogorath.[/b]

HAVE FUN!!!!!!

[youtube]K3fRT2RTlNQ[/youtube]

Remember he likes cheese  X;O


Feel Free to make a video of your own send me a link and ill post it on here ;)
